name: worker-portal
description: Expose an API to a Web Worker

scripts.build:umd:min: npm run build:umd && uglifyjs -m --screw-ie8 -c -o dist/worker-portal.min.js dist/worker-portal.js
scripts.build:umd:gzip: npm run build:umd:min && gzip -c9 dist/worker-portal.min.js > dist/worker-portal.min.js.gz
scripts.prepublish: npm run clean && npm run build
